name: YÜY
description:
YÜY IS NOT FINISHED, This is a Demo of YÜY created by DMac, and Dylan Cross with music by Joey Soumokil - https://soundcloud.com/joey-soumokil

Controls:

Left Right Arrow Keys to Move

Space Bar to Jump

Up Arrow Key to Aim Up

Down Arrow Key while in air to Aim Down

Shift to Dash

A to Switch Weapons

Z to Fire Weapon

X to Talk / Progress dialogue

Enter to select menu

P to Pause

Demo Ends once you receive the first health up and loop back to the first save room.

YÜY is being developed for the Metroidvania Game Jam Month 14. We hope you enjoy!

Current Executable made for Windows
